Focus on pentest: DoS vectors, weak auth (PasswordAuthenticator), encryption (SSL), exposed ports (9042). **Learning Objectives:** [Insert the full learning_objectives array here]. **Scaffolding Layers:** [Insert the full scaffolding_layers array here]. Distribute flashcards: 10 per layer. **Active Learning Tie-Ins:** Reference discussions/activities in explanations (e.g., 'Relates to peer teaching on nodetool'). **Generation Rules:** - Cover voter priorities: Bloom's progression, tool completeness (nodetool details, cqlsh injections), pentest relevance. - Ensure SMART objectives alignment. - Balance: 1/3 beginner (Layers 1-2), 2/3 advanced (Layers 3-4). - Use research context for accuracy (e.g., cassandra-stress capabilities: population distribution, rate limiting). **Schema:** Strictly follow flashcard_generation_schema. Output ONLY a JSON array of 40 flashcards. No additional text.
